features.featureTitle: Update every occurrence of the subscription price across the entire codebase from 19.90 CHF to 29.90 CHF/month. Specifically update: SubscriptionModal.tsx subtitle text ('Then 29.90 CHF / month'), TabPaiement.tsx financial summary line ('Monthly subscription cost: 29.90 CHF'), ProBusinessScreen.tsx any CTA or label referencing the subscription cost, and any other string in the frontend that displays the old price. The 7-day free trial period remains unchanged.

Create frontend/src/screens/pro/ProPitchScreen.tsx as a full conversion landing screen (screen key: 'pro_pitch') that convinces independent professionals to subscribe to NEXUS Pro. Layout: position fixed inset-0, display flex, flex-direction column, background var(--void), scroll zone flex-1 overflow-y auto. Content sections in order: (1) Hero — four animated blur orbs (same float keyframe as LoginScreen), headline 'The platform that sets you free' Inter 900 48px #F4F4F8 centered, subheadline 'No boss. No commission. Just your clients.' Inter 400 18px #9898B4, gold gradient divider; (2) Three value pillars in glass-card rows with a colored icon circle (40px) left — 'Freedom' (IconHome #F2D06B): 'Work where you want, when you want, at your price'; 'Revenue' (IconWallet #00D97A): 'Keep 85% of every booking — no hidden fees'; 'Network' (IconRadar #5B7FFF): 'Join 500+ independent pros already on NEXUS'; (3) Animated counter showing '500+' active pros (count-up from 0 over 2s on mount) Inter 900 64px #F2D06B centered with label 'professionals trust NEXUS' Inter 400 14px #9898B4; (4) Three testimonial cards horizontal scroll — fictitious pros with Unsplash avatar images, name, category, city, star rating (filled #F2D06B), quote text Inter 400 14px #9898B4 — Unsplash IDs: photo-1570172619644-dfd03ed5d881 (Sophie R., Esthetique, Lausanne, 4.9 stars, 'My revenue doubled in 3 months'), photo-1503951914875-452162b0f3f1 (Karim B., Barber, Geneva, 5.0 stars, 'I work 100% on my own terms now'), photo-1544161515-4ab6ce6db874 (Marc T., Massage, Zurich, 4.8 stars, 'Best investment I made for my practice'); (5) Satisfaction guarantee row: IconShield #00D97A + '30-day money-back guarantee' Inter 600 14px #F4F4F8; (6) CTA zone flex-shrink-0 padding 16px 20px: BtnPrimary 'Start free for 7 days' gold gradient text #050507 onClick calls go('pro_subscription'), below button 'TWINT only · 29.90 CHF/month after trial' Inter 400 12px #54546C centered. Add 'pro_pitch' to the Screen union type in useAppState.ts and add a case in App.tsx renderScreen() switch. Back arrow in header calls go('pro_dashboard'). Zero emoji.

Add a 'View pitch' entry point from ProDashboardScreen: add a secondary link or card below the metric cards labeled 'Why NEXUS Pro — discover all features' Inter 500 13px #F2D06B with IconArrowRight size 14 #F2D06B that calls go('pro_pitch') on click. This must be visible in the scroll zone without requiring scroll on most screens.

Create frontend/src/screens/pro/ProStatsScreen.tsx as a dedicated analytics screen (screen key: 'pro_stats'). Layout: position fixed inset-0, display flex, flex-direction column, header absolute 56px with back arrow calling go('pro_dashboard'), scroll zone flex-1 overflow-y auto paddingTop 72px, TabBarPro flex-shrink-0 at bottom with no active tab. Content sections: (1) Conversion rate card glass-card: label 'Profile views → Bookings' Inter 600 12px #54546C uppercase, value '24%' Inter 900 48px #F2D06B, subtitle 'Based on last 30 days' Inter 400 12px #9898B4; (2) Revenue per service bar chart: 6 animated vertical bars (heights animate from 0 on mount), each bar labeled with service name below in Inter 500 10px #54546C and CHF amount above in Inter 700 12px #F2D06B — demo values: Haircut 420 CHF, Beard trim 180 CHF, Hair+Beard 315 CHF, Shave 100 CHF, Kids cut 80 CHF, Other 60 CHF; bars use gradient fill linear-gradient(to top, #D4A050, #F2D06B) border-radius 6px 6px 0 0; (3) Peak hours heatmap: 7 rows (Mon–Sun) x 12 columns (8h–20h) SVG grid — each cell is a 28x20px rectangle, fill color opacity scales from rgba(242,208,107,0.05) to rgba(242,208,107,0.6) based on a demo booking density value, row/column labels Inter 500 10px #54546C; (4) Rating trend card: line chart SVG showing rating over last 30 days (demo values: 4.6, 4.7, 4.7, 4.8, 4.8, 4.9), line stroke #F2D06B 2px, area fill rgba(242,208,107,0.06); (5) Top 3 loyal clients section: 3 glass-card rows showing initials avatar circle 40px #1C1C26 #F2D06B border, name Inter 600 14px #F4F4F8, '# bookings' Inter 400 12px #9898B4 — demo: 'Thomas M. · 8 bookings', 'Julien R. · 5 bookings', 'Sophie L. · 4 bookings'; (6) Monthly revenue projection card: 'Projected this month' Inter 600 12px #54546C, value '340 CHF' Inter 900 36px #00D97A, subtitle 'Based on your current average' Inter 400 12px #9898B4. Add 'pro_stats' to Screen union type in useAppState.ts and case in App.tsx. Zero emoji.

Add a 'View my stats' entry point from ProDashboardScreen: add a link/button labeled 'View my stats' Inter 500 12px #F2D06B with IconArrowRight size 14 in the Next appointment card footer area that calls go('pro_stats') on click.

Create frontend/src/screens/pro/ProShareScreen.tsx as a social sharing screen (screen key: 'pro_share'). Layout: position fixed inset-0, display flex, flex-direction column, header absolute 56px with back arrow calling go('pro_dashboard'), scroll zone flex-1 overflow-y auto paddingTop 72px. Content: (1) Share profile preview card glass-card 280px centered: pro cover Unsplash image 120px height with gradient overlay, avatar 60px gold border, pro name Inter 700 18px #F4F4F8, category + city Inter 400 13px #9898B4, star rating row (filled #F2D06B), 'from X CHF' Inter 600 14px #F2D06B, link text 'nexus.app/pro/[state.proData.id ?? demo-001]' Inter 500 11px #54546C; (2) QR code section: generate a dynamic SVG QR code representing the URL 'https://nexus.app/pro/[id]' — implement a minimal QR code SVG generator in pure TypeScript using a simple matrix approach (no external library), render as an SVG 180x180px with dark modules on white/transparent background, center the SVG in a white 200x200px rounded card; (3) Share options grid 2x2: each option is a glass-card button 80px height with colored icon circle 44px and label below Inter 500 12px #F4F4F8 — 'Copy link' (IconCheck #F2D06B, onClick: navigator.clipboard.writeText(url).then(() => showToast('Link copied!', 'success'))), 'WhatsApp' (IconMessage #00D97A, onClick: window.open('https://wa.me/?text=' + encodeURIComponent('Discover my profile on NEXUS: https://nexus.app/pro/[id]'))), 'SMS' (IconPhone #5B7FFF, onClick: window.open('sms:?body=' + encodeURIComponent('Book me on NEXUS: https://nexus.app/pro/[id]'))), 'Instagram' (IconCamera #FF3D5A, onClick: navigator.clipboard.writeText(url).then(() => showToast('Link copied — paste in your bio!', 'info'))). Add 'pro_share' to Screen union type and App.tsx renderScreen() switch. Zero emoji.

Add 'Share my profile' buttons on ProDashboardScreen and ProBusinessScreen. On ProDashboardScreen: add a secondary action button in the greeting section area labeled 'Share my profile' with IconArrowRight size 14, background rgba(242,208,107,0.08) border 1px solid rgba(242,208,107,0.2) border-radius 999px padding 8px 16px, Inter 600 13px #F2D06B, onClick calls go('pro_share'). On ProBusinessScreen: add the same style button in the CTA zone area (above the main CTA button) on tabs 1 and 2 only, calling go('pro_share'). Zero emoji.

Create frontend/src/screens/pro/ProNetworkScreen.tsx as a micro-network / referral screen (screen key: 'pro_network'). Layout: position fixed inset-0, display flex, flex-direction column, header absolute 56px with back arrow calling go('pro_dashboard'), scroll zone flex-1 overflow-y auto paddingTop 72px. Content sections: (1) Referral code card glass-card centered: title 'My referral code' Inter 700 18px #F4F4F8, code value 'NEXUS-[STATE_ID or DEMO42]' Inter 900 32px #F2D06B letter-spacing 0.08em in a bordered box background #1C1C26 border 1px dashed rgba(242,208,107,0.3) border-radius 14px padding 16px, copy button (IconCheck #F2D06B label 'Copy code' Inter 600 13px #F2D06B background rgba(242,208,107,0.08) border 1px solid rgba(242,208,107,0.2) border-radius 999px padding 8px 16px) that calls navigator.clipboard.writeText(code).then(() => showToast('Code copied!', 'success')); (2) Reward explanation card glass-card: IconStar #F2D06B 24px + 'Earn 1 free month for every pro you bring who activates a subscription' Inter 500 14px #F4F4F8; (3) Stats row: two metrics side-by-side — 'Pros invited' Inter 400 12px #54546C with value '3' Inter 800 28px #F4F4F8, 'Months earned' Inter 400 12px #54546C with value '1' Inter 800 28px #00D97A; (4) Network list section title 'My network' Inter 700 16px #F4F4F8 with gold left accent bar 3px; list of 3 demo pros: each glass-card row 72px height showing initials avatar circle 40px, name Inter 600 14px #F4F4F8, category + city Inter 400 12px #9898B4, status badge pill (active: 'Active' background rgba(0,217,122,0.1) text #00D97A; pending: 'Pending' background rgba(242,208,107,0.1) text #F2D06B) — demo: 'Marie L. · Coiffure · Lausanne · Active', 'Sofiane R. · Barber · Geneva · Active', 'Emma D. · Esthetique · Berne · Pending'; (5) Invite CTA: BtnPrimary 'Invite a colleague' gold gradient text #050507 onClick calls go('pro_share'). Add 'pro_network' to Screen union type and App.tsx renderScreen(). Zero emoji.

Add a 'My Network' entry point from ProBusinessScreen: in the ProBusinessScreen content zone (visible on all tabs below the active tab content), add a secondary glass-card row 64px height at the bottom of the scroll zone showing IconRadar #5B7FFF 20px, label 'My Network — invite colleagues & earn rewards' Inter 500 13px #F4F4F8, subtitle '3 pros in your network' Inter 400 11px #9898B4, IconChevronRight #54546C 16px on the right edge — onClick calls go('pro_network'). Also add an entry point on ProDashboardScreen as a row card in the scroll zone below the next appointment card with the same styling. Zero emoji.

Add a pro visibility boost feature to ProDashboardScreen. Add a glass-card section labeled 'Boost my visibility' Inter 700 16px #F4F4F8 with gold left accent bar 3px in the scroll zone below the Flash toggle card. Inside the card, display 3 boost tier rows: (1) 'Standard' row — label Inter 600 13px #9898B4 'Included in your subscription', status pill 'Active' background rgba(0,217,122,0.1) text #00D97A; (2) 'Premium' row — label 'Top of list for 1 week' Inter 600 13px #F4F4F8, price '+5 CHF/week' Inter 500 12px #9898B4, button 'Activate' background rgba(242,208,107,0.1) border 1px solid rgba(242,208,107,0.3) border-radius 999px padding 6px 14px Inter 600 12px #F2D06B — onClick calls showToast('Premium boost activated via TWINT — coming soon', 'info'); (3) 'Flash 24h' row — label 'Appear with BOOST badge in Explorer' Inter 600 13px #F4F4F8, price '+2 CHF/day' Inter 500 12px #9898B4, animated 'BOOST' badge pill background linear-gradient(135deg, #F2D06B, #D4A050) text #050507 Inter 800 9px letter-spacing 0.06em with a subtle breathe animation (scale 1→1.05→1 over 2s), button 'Activate' same pill style as Premium row — onClick calls showToast('Flash 24h boost activated via TWINT — coming soon', 'info'). In ExplorerScreen, for PROS_DEMO entries that have flash === true AND note >= 4.8 (Alexandre, Karim), render an animated 'BOOST' pill badge (same gradient style, breathe animation) on the card overlaid at the top-right corner. Zero emoji.

Update frontend/src/state/useAppState.ts to add the new screen values to the Screen union type: 'pro_pitch', 'pro_stats', 'pro_share', 'pro_network'. All other fields, defaults, and behaviors remain unchanged. The go() function must handle all new screen values without any guards.

Update frontend/src/App.tsx renderScreen() switch to add cases for all new screens: case 'pro_pitch' renders ProPitchScreen, case 'pro_stats' renders ProStatsScreen, case 'pro_share' renders ProShareScreen, case 'pro_network' renders ProNetworkScreen. All cases pass go, state, update, showToast, removeToast props. No fallthrough between cases. The default case continues to fall back to LoginScreen. All existing 28 cases remain intact.
